data.text: IMF Chief Economist @GitaGopinath: The fastest way to improve the economic outlook is to suppress the pandemic – cooperation on the global production and distribution of vaccines is essential. https://t.co/tTKrF2WFik #WEO #IMFBlog

In October 2020, The Bahamas leapfrogged into the digital vanguard with the launch of the world’s first central bank digital currency—the sand dollar. Learn more: https://t.co/lW8qGLDJm2 #fintech https://t.co/tfqSB9hyur

For the first time in 20 years, global poverty significantly increased. The pandemic has set us back in many ways and including on reaching the #SDGs. Our #IMFblog calls on the international community to step up support. https://t.co/9j8hbn17qE https://t.co/Fwmyw99FN0

Support from governments, including "quasi"-equity injections, could help more small- and medium-sized businesses survive the crisis. But such support needs to be targeted at viable firms. Read more in this #IMFBlog: https://t.co/ruPCdqw196 https://t.co/lq4SePL7NF

Get inspired by this conversation with IMF Managing Director @KGeorgieva and Canada’s Deputy Prime Minister Chrystia Freeland (@cafreeland) on gender equality and policies to help fully integrate women into the workforce. #IMFExchange https://t.co/uf6QuVr9As

The latest Regional Economic Outlook for Sub-Saharan #Africa discusses policies needed to support the recovery and unlock the region’s potential. Download the report here: https://t.co/cm2FeSbmym #IMFAfrica https://t.co/yR6PVoEMgW

The pandemic may end up worsening gender and income inequality. In the United States mothers with less than a college degree & mothers of color lost or quit their jobs in larger numbers, and are coming back to work at a much slower pace than other workers. https://t.co/sPUvlrNGie https://t.co/spplBnJOq7

In the short to medium term, vaccine policy is economic policy. Speeding access to vaccines can boost global GDP by 1 percentage point. Check out our latest projections for the global economy. https://t.co/hcZ4l9uUWv #WEO https://t.co/QgdqEp34I6

Sierra Leone's education minister, David Sengeh, wants every child to have access to quality education. In a recent #FandD profile, @DSengeh describes why his country has linked education to its development agenda in an attempt to narrow inequality. https://t.co/5yKvK7ZzEb https://t.co/y5hDrTh2p3

While #Morocco and some #GCC countries have expedited the vaccine rollout, many low-income countries in the region may take until 2023 to achieve full vaccine coverage. Click here to see how this could affect the economic outlook: https://t.co/DNMMSNQRdW https://t.co/XihiXDiAjX

The pandemic threatens to roll back women’s gains in economic opportunities, particularly those in low-wage jobs. @KGeorgieva & @cafreeland engage in an inspiring conversation on gender equality & policies to help fully integrate women into the workforce. https://t.co/rNAYBAwbtu https://t.co/Bhc6RTuVAI

During the pandemic, women with younger children have suffered larger job losses and/or a drop in hours than other women and men.

✔️ Investing in health and education
✔️ Providing social protection for all
✔️ Enacting bold tax reforms

Central banks, finance ministries, and the financial sector have to realize that climate considerations are a key economic issue that will affect long-term growth and prosperity. Find out what the IMF does to tackle #climatechange. https://t.co/WGBaBr9US4

.@KGeorgieva I couldn’t think of a better person to celebrate #EarthDay2021 with than @CFigueres! 
Watch the video to find out why the new climate economy is at the heart of our work.
 #IMFexchange #Earthday https://t.co/7DNXYo7cN5

The effects of #climatechange are disastrous for all life on the planet. Implementing smart policies now can both boost the economy and save the planet from the worst environmental consequences.  https://t.co/uGqdAbncb2 #Earthday https://t.co/iptdooBACy

A successful #COP26 according to the architect of the Paris Agreement @CFigueres requires increased national commitments to cut emissions, a price on polluting carbon, and stepped up financial support for developing countries. #IMFexchange #EarthDay https://t.co/FdcHiFAiFC

.@KGeorgieva: We can deliver on the #ParisClimateAgreement w/ these 3 critical elements:
✔️A carbon price 
✔️A green investment push
✔️A just transition 

Watch the #IMFexchange event w/ @CFigueres here https://t.co/eGFoBoN3wk
